enchantment.simplemusket.firepower.desc: Bullets fired from a musket have increased armor piercing capabilities.
enchantment.simplemusket.deadeye.desc: Increases musket aim speed and reduces the movement penalty while aiming.
enchantment.simplemusket.repeating.desc: Allows the musket to fire an extra round per reload.
enchantment.simplemusket.longshot.desc: Bullets fired from a musket deal more damage the further they travel.
enchantment.simplemusket.blast.desc: Bullets fired from a musket fragment, increasing close range damage and releasing shrapnel.
